description:
1. Spenn – The new Nordic rewards currency
Earn Spenn and use it on whatever you want. Connect your loyalty programs, access unique offers and discounts, and get a complete overview of your earnings – all in one app. With Spenn, you have the freedom to choose what suits you best.

2. Everything in one placeVi har forbedret Wallet-fanen! Du kan nu nemt se afventende transaktioner og dykke ned i alle detaljer. Derudover har vi rettet en række andre fejl undervejs.
The app keeps you fully in control. In addition to tracking your Spenn earnings, you’ll have a wide selection of discounts and unique offers to choose from. Explore inspiring experiences and services, and discover new ways to earn Spenn every day.

3. Earn Spenn
You earn Spenn on every purchase! Access exclusive offers from a broad range of well-known brands. The more Spenn you earn, the more freedom you have to spend them on what you need.

4. Use Spenn
Fly off on a weekend getaway with Norwegian or check in at a Strawberry hotel – you decide how to use your earned Spenn. In its core, Spenn is a rewards currency designed to make your daily life a little better.

5. Connect your memberships
Enhance your Spenn experience by linking your loyalty programs in the app. This way, it’s easier to earn Spenn even faster.

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

FLEXIBLE WAYS TO PAY
Choose to pay in 3 interest-free instalments, pay the full amount, in 30 days or with financing.¹

¹ UK: Klarna’s Pay in 3/Pay in 30 days are unregulated credit agreements. Klarna Financing is regulated if it charges interest or lasts over 12 months. It is not regulated if it’s 0% interest and 12 months or less. Borrowing more than you can afford or paying late may negatively impact your financial status and ability to obtain credit. 18+, UK residents only. Klarna’s Regulated Financing has a representative APR of 21.9% (fixed).

¹ Ireland: Please shop responsibly. 18+ ROI residents only. Credit subject to status. APR 0%. Missed payments may incur a fee and affect your ability to use Klarna in the future. T&Cs apply. https://www.klarna.com/ie/terms-and-conditions/. 

SHOP ANYWHERE IN THE KLARNA APP
Access Klarna's flexible payment options anywhere - shop at your favorite stores and split your purchase with the payment plan that suits you.

UP TO 10% CASHBACK
Shop in the app and earn up to 10% cashback. Get cashback at hundreds of stores in the app.²

² Klarna Cashback Rewards are awarded as points which can be redeemed for a credit to your Klarna Balance and other benefits. Earn cashback on Klarna App purchases. Klarna balance account required. Cashback issuance depends on store approval and may be affected by cookie settings, combining offers, product exclusions, or other factors beyond our control. Klarna may get a commission. Limitations, terms and conditions apply.

SHOP WITH THE KLARNA CARD
Pay with Klarna anywhere Visa is accepted. Pay now or pay later with the card. No fees and no credit impact to apply.³ 

³ UK & Ireland: A paid Klarna Membership is required for a physical card. Klarna Membership offered for a monthly fee. Cancel any time in the Klarna app. Exclusions, conditions, and limitations apply to membership benefits like Klarna Membership cashback. Klarna Membership Terms apply.

UNLOCK YOUR KLARNA BALANCE
Add money to your balance and pay flexibly, anywhere you shop. Get instant refunds, earn cashback at eligible stores, and convert your cashback as a credit in your balance.⁴

⁴ Ireland: Account covered by the Swedish deposit guarantee scheme. Max. compensation per customer: SEK 1,050,000. National Debt Office makes compensation available within 7 business days from the date a right to compensation accrues. Read more here.

USE KLARNA WITH APPLE PAY
Split the cost with Klarna on Apple Pay, available in-store and online.

FIND THE BEST PRICE, EVERY TIME
Search for any product and instantly compare prices across stores.

HASSLE-FREE RETURNS
Need to send something back? Report a return right in the app. We’ll pause your purchase so you don’t have to pay in the meantime.

TRACK ALL YOUR DELIVERIES
Get real-time updates, arrival times, and pickup photos—right in the Klarna app.

24/7 CUSTOMER SERVICE
Use our chat in the Klarna app for 24/7 support.

Save money with discount codes from Rabatta.

■ Discount codes that work - for free
More than 1,000,000+ people have already installed Rabatta and saved money with our discount codes.
When you visit a webshop, Rabatta automatically finds active discount codes and applies the one with the biggest saving.

■ New discount codes every day
We are constantly adding new discount codes
You get access to our collection of over 10.000+ discount codes

■ Notifications for new discounts
Get notified when new discount codes are discovered for your favorite webshops

■ Community-driven discounts■
Join the community to discover and share discount codes with other Rabatta users

■ It's 100% free to install and use Rabatta
Get started today and find a discount code for your favorite webshop

Start Saving Today – Download Rabatta for Free!

Shop on Temu for exclusive offers. 

No matter what you're looking for, Temu has you covered, including fashion, home decor, handmade crafts, beauty & cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and more.

Download Temu today and enjoy incredible deals daily.

WIDE SELECTION
Discover thousands of new products and shops.

CONVENIENCE
Fast and secure checkout.
Free shipping & returns within 90 days.
*Other conditions may apply

Visit temu.com or follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/temu/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@temu 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shoptemu
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@temu

The Zalando app is your new go-to for quality fashion and lifestyle brands (over 6,000!), outfit and beauty inspiration at your fingertips, and a shopping experience that’s all smooth and no stress.

IT'S GIVING INSPIRATION
• Follow your favourite creators for outfit and styling inspo
• Follow brands you like to see more from them first, including new releases and exclusive collections
• Curate and follow boards of the outfits, videos, and products that inspire you, and start inspiring others
• Explore what’s trending across Europe with Trend Spotter and see what everyone’s wearing in Berlin, Paris, and Milan right now
• Tune into our Live videos to get tips from the experts, product how-tos, and inspo you can add directly to your bag
• Tap into Stories to get your style and culture guide with features like “What do I wear?” plus the latest on major brand collabs
• Save your faves to your wishlist and never miss a size update or price drop

IT'S GIVING CHOICE
• Browse over 11,000 items from a wide range of brands, including all-time fashion favourites
• Dive into our different assortments: clothing, shoes, accessories, sports, beauty and skincare, preloved gems, and kidswear
• Get updates on the things you care about - from news and trends to sales and discount codes
• Hear about new collections and product launches from the brands you love
• Never miss a price drop or restock by opting in to notifications on items in your wishlist
• Give preloved clothing a new life when you shop our extensive selection of pre-owned (but just like new!) clothing, accessories, and boots
Pick your preferred way to pay and enjoy delivery directly to your own doorstep

IT'S GIVING PERSONAL
• Benefit from spot-on recommendations that show you the items you’ll love, without you needing to go looking for them
• Rate how the fashion you’ve ordered fits and get personalised sizing advice as you shop
• Get measured with our measurements tool to find what fits, fast
• Try on outfits in our virtual fitting room to see how they’ll fit before ordering
• Get instant style and outfit advice from the Zalando Assistant, a tailor-made AI-powered fashion assistant to help you on your shopping journey

So, ready to explore the app?
Shop the brands you love, unlock exclusive deals, and get inspiration and recommendations that feel like they were made just for you.

I Trumf-appen har du som er Trumf-medlem alt samlet på ett sted!

Betaling med Trumf Pay
Betal med mobilen hos KIWI, MENY, Joker, SPAR, Nærbutikken, Jacob’s og CC Mat. Du sparer 1 % ekstra bonus hver gang du handler med Trumf Pay!

Digitale kvitteringer
I appen finner du kvitteringer for alle handler der du har fått registrert Trumf-bonus på, enten de er gjort med Trumf Pay eller et bankkort

Digitalt Trumf-kort
Hvis du betaler med andre mobilbetalings-tjenester, smartklokke eller kredittkort, kan du skanne det digitale Trumf-kortet i kassa for å spare bonus

Bruk bonusen slik du vil
Betal i butikken med Trumf-bonus, eller overfør til en av dine bankkontoer

Få oversikt over alle Trumf-fordelene 
I appen finner du oversikt over alle steder du kan spare bonus som Trumf-medlem

When you are on the road our app is your friend! Enjoy a range of different digital services that are constantly evolving to give you the best possible Circle K experience.

- Carwash Subscription available in Norway
Save money and time with new monthly based carwash subscription. Subscription can be used in every Circle K car wash. Just choose wash plan, go to nearest carwash site and enjoy the simplicity of washing your car!

- Mobile Payment
Smoothly fuel and wash your car whilst sorting out payment directly in the app*.

- Circle K EXTRA
Follow up on your personalized EXTRA offers and discounts, easily oversee your purchase history and connected bank cards as well as manage your personal data and communication preferences.

- Map search
Find your nearest Circle K station, get directions there, and a customized and detailed view of its services and fuel types.

*mobile payment for car wash is available only in selected countries: Lithuania

The multi-tool to save money and time in everyday life. Deals and leaflets are aggregated from stores within groceries, do-it-yourself, interior, cross-border, electronics, and much more.

See what people have to say about the app:

- "Thanks for giving us the best free service I’ve ever had in my entire life"

- "There’s no app this fantastic. They listen to people; few developers do. We save a lot of money, maybe more than 25 %"

- "Fantastic with all leaflets in one place. Easy and quick access to next week’s deals"

- "Just the app I’ve been longing for. Awesome to add this week’s deals on the shopping list"

- "A clever feature with a shopping list that can be shared"

- "Can do so many things other apps can’t"

- "This is the best app to manage your shopping and deals. I use it EVERY day"

- "It’s fantastic to see your commercials when you need it. Or check if something should go on the shopping list before visiting your favorite stores"

- "Genius you can add all the great deals from home so you don’t forget them when in the store"

- "The chosen commercials in my area inspire me for what I would like to do - meal plans or other things"

- "I struggle a bit with my economy, and I get the best overview of many commercials so I can make the best choices”

The app is free from ads, third-parties tracking you, and all that stuff. We focus on a simple, clean, secure, and reliable app where you are in control.

We’re an entire team of people that improve the app every day so don’t hesitate to contact us on hello@etilbudsavis.dk if you need a feature or experience a bug.

Best regards,
eTilbudsavis

Say hello to 55,000 beauty products, or:
- Follow inspiring Lyko Social accounts
- Check out looks and clever beauty hacks
- Share pictures, videos, and hot tips
- Find likeminded users and get followers
- Scroll through all things hair, skin, makeup, fragrance
- Read reviews
- Rate and review products
- Save your favorites
- Chat with customer service
- Get member perks
- Win goodie bags and stuff
- Read about trends (or start your own)

Note! This app is guaranteed to be free of inhibitions = no don’ts, only do’s. So, let loose in front of the mirror: Try a braid, a bob cut, or no hair at all. Switch it up with French, glazed, ombre, and somewhat chipped manicure – all at once. Fake freckles, mascara clumps, bleached-out brows. Fragrance for him for her, and fragrance for her for him – or all in on your natural scent. Learn “the perfect skincare routine” – just to break the rules. Every way is okay – and we’ll help you find yours.

See you in the app! Hope you’ll like it.

PS. This is our best app ever, no doubt… and our first! Questions? Email customersupport@lyko.com

Tise is the place to go for buying and selling pre-loved fashion. 
Selling on Tise is safe, simple – and rewards you with loyalty points!

No seller fees
Time for a wardrobe refresh? Create your own profile and sell what you no longer wear – all without seller fees. Earn cash, declutter, feel good!

Join our pre-loved community
Built on a passionate community of buyers and sellers, we make pre-loved fashion feel easy, inspiring and exciting.

Like, follow and connect to shop
Follow people whose style you like to shop their wardrobe!

Shop the latest trends for less
Upgrade your wardrobe without breaking the bank.

Tise points makes tising even more rewarding
Collect points when you sell, buy or list – and use them for discount on shipping and service fee.

Discover the Zara collection with proposals for Women, Men and Kids. Through our application and our online store, you can shop and see all our new collections and fashion editorials for the upcoming seasons. 


Woman: 
Among Zara's proposals for women are the following categories of clothing and accessories: 
-	Shirts 
-	T-shirts/Bodysuits
-	Tops
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	Skirts
-	Trousers
-	Jeans
-	Shorts
-	Coats
-	Shoes
-	Bags
-	Swimwear
-	Accessories
-	Lingerie
-	Beauty
-	Perfume 
-	Basics
-	Total Look
-	Suits


Man:
The Zara Collection for men includes: 
-	Basics
-	Trousers
-	Cargo/parachute 
-	Jeans
-	Jackets/overshirts
-	Sweatshirts & Hoodies
-	T-shirts
-	Shirts
-	Polos
-	Bermuda shorts
-	Sweaters/jackets
-	Suits
-	Trench coats
-	Blazers
-	Shoes
-	Bags/backpacks
-	Accessories
-	Perfume 


Kids:
A selection for garments, accessories and shoes for: 
-	Girl: 6–⁠14 years
-	Boy: 6–⁠14 years
-	Baby girl: 9 months - 6 years
-	Baby boy: 9 months - 6 years
-	Newborn: 0-12 months
	
In addition, Zara's children's collection includes its Edited/customisable section, a selection of customisable clothing and accessories that is updated weekly. 


In addition to our permanent collections, with our Zara App you can find all our special launches, our beauty category and our lingerie line. 

Other utilities of the Zara App are:  
-	Favourites: Use your favourites list to save all the clothes and accessories you like.
-	Easy, intuitive and fast tracking of orders and returns. Track your order in each part of the process. 
-	Find your nearest Zara store. 
-	Activate notifications and receive information about new arrivals, launchings, special collections... 


Store mode 
-	Use your application in ""store mode"" when you are shopping in any of our stores and use all its features to improve your experience. 


Zara QR:
Use your QR on the Zara App for: 
-	Having associated all of your purchases online and at physical stores. At a physical store, identify yourself at the till with your Zara QR code and request an e-receipt.
-	In-store returns for both online and in-store purchases.
-	Collect all of your online orders at a physical store.

En brukt skatt kan være så mangt, men har du tenkt på at de fleste store tingene i livet ofte kjøpes brukt - og ofte kjøpes via FINN? Det vet vi, og derfor jobber vi hele tiden med å gjøre appen vår så bra som overhodet mulig for akkurat deg.

FIKS FERDIG - FRAKT OG BETALING

Shop smarter by comparing products, prices and shops. Find the lowest price and save money on every purchase.


PriceSpy monitors hundreds of thousands of products to help you find the best product, at the lowest price, in the most reliable shop:
Find the right product – Search and compare products side by side to choose the right one
Find the lowest price – Compare offers from different shops
Get deals & promotions – Find the best deals of the day
Check if it's time to buy – Look into the price history of any product


COMPARE PRODUCTS, PRICES AND SHOPS
Comparing is key to a good purchase. Compare products side by side to find the one that suits you best, compare shops based on ratings and reviews – and compare prices to find the best offer.

DAILY DEALS
Find the exclusive offers and promotions before anyone else does! On Daily Deals we list products that have a great price right now. We keep an eye on the price trends and find the deals that stand out – you will never miss a sale!

PRICE HISTORY
Find the right time to buy. You can see the price history of each product to give you an idea of when and how much the price might drop. Check if it's bargain time before you strike, you can save a lot of money!



Contact us at support@pricespy.co.uk, via https://www.pricespy.co.uk, or reach us on Facebook [https://www.facebook.com/PriceSpyUK] or Twitter [https://twitter.com/PriceSpyUK].

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is an affordable online shopping platform offering rich items and trendy goods. Discovering pretty items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We take pride in satisfying our customers and bringing them the best shopping experience.

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now!

Save you more
- Register and get £3 includes sale
- Free limited-time delivery and free returns within 30 Days（*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items 

Wide selections
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- 24/7 Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/SHEINOFFICIAL/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sheinofficial/
Email: dispute@shein.com


The app needs the following access permissions when it is running on your device:

-	Optional permission(s):

o	Notification: it will allow us to send push notifications to your device.

o	Camera: the camera function is required when you need to capture photos and videos and upload them to the app.

o	Photo and video: it will enable you to upload photos and videos from your device to the app.

o	Location: where the relevant service is available, it enables location based services on your device. 
(This is not used in Korea.)

o	Calendar: it enables you to sync the SHEIN LIVE events to your device calendar. 

o	Microphone: when you try to capture videos using Camera function, the app will also need the microphone access permission to capture the voice. 

※ Even if you do not grant optional access permissions, you can still use SHEIN service, except for the functions related to those permissions.

Boozt – The Nordic Department Store

Discover the latest trends and collections for women, men, and kids, and shop
from our five popular categories: Fashion, Kids, Sport, Beauty, and Home.

Download the app and enjoy these special benefits and features:
- Get notified on sales offers and special discounts.
- Enjoy ultra-fast delivery
- 30-day free return policy.
- Keep track of your orders.
- Quick, easy, and secure payment options.
- Shop a wide variety of products from our five departments: Fashion, Kids,Sport, Beauty, Home.
- Browse among 700+ Scandinavian and international brands.
- Explore our Designer shop full of carefully selected premium brands.
- Stay updated on the latest trends and collections.
- Enable push notifications to receive instant alerts about sales, special discounts, and new collections.
- Save your favourite styles in a wishlist for future purchases.
- Follow your favourite brands and get notified about new collections andre stocks.
- Shop sustainable fashion from our Made with Care category.
- Explore ReBoozt, where you can shop and sell pre-loved Boozt items.
- Join Club Boozt and earn points, that will unlock extra discounts and special benefits, each time you shop.
- Reach out to our friendly customer service team whenever you need help.

Shop on the go with the Nordic Department Store in your pocket!

Discover an all-new take on the original Nespresso shopping experience to bring your go-to favourites and latest coffee creations closer to you than ever before.

Easier shopping
Browse. Choose. Order. Before you know it, your favourite coffee will be on its way, as simple as that.

Designed with you in mind

Discover a selection of products based on what you love to explore uncharted flavour territories. Experience the convenience of seamless reorders, ensuring that your favourite coffees are always within reach.

Follow your order

Stay in the loop with real-time updates so you know what’s happening with your order at every step. Relax, unwind and let us take care of bringing your coffee experience straight to you.

Expect more than coffee

Explore new cities and single-origin regions without packing a bag. Personalise your experience with a variety of machines and accessories that make each coffee moment uniquely yours.*

A new dedicated app to connect

If you’ve enjoyed the connected features of your Vertuo machine, you should know that they're moving to their own app: Nespresso Smart. A new experience to unlock all the potential of your Vertuo's features *


For all your shopping, get the Nespresso App now and elevate your coffee moments!

* Availability of features will depend upon your geographical area

The IKEA mobile app is where your inspiration comes to life. Find that cute armchair you saw at your friend’s place or look through thousands of products and ideas just for you - to make your space truly your own.

Whether you’re looking to buy online or in-store, the IKEA app is your perfect shopping companion.

Scan the products while you walk through the store  - and skip the checkout line.

Are you planning a big project or small home improvements? Save and organise your favourites in lists for later. They are ready when you are!

Found the perfect IKEA furniture or home decoration? Let us do the heavy lifting. Order home delivery and be informed every step of the way, by tracking your order easily in the app.

The IKEA app is also a convenient home for your IKEA Family benefits. Access your IKEA Family card quickly and find all your past receipts conveniently in one location.

IKEA values your data privacy and believes in ethical use of customer data. That’s why you’re in control of all your data at all times.

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Last ned Coop appen slik at du alltid har medlemskortet, Coopay, handlelista, fordelene og kupongene dine lett tilgjengelig.

Coop appen kan brukes i alle våre butikker; Obs, Extra, Coop Prix, Coop Mega, Coop Marked, Matkroken, Obs Bygg og Coop Byggmix.

Skann medlemskort
• Få penger tilbake hver gang du handler hos Coop, i form av kjøpeutbytte og bonuser
• Bruk Coopay og betal med appen, legg igjen lommeboka hjemme! 

Personlige kuponger
• Som Coop medlem mottar du kuponger på varer du handler ofte
• Du får i snitt 20 % rabatt på kupongene
• Se etter gratiskuponger!

Min kundeavis
• Se ukens tilbud fra din butikk, sortert etter ditt handlemønster
• Se kundeavis fra alle Coop sine butikker  

Litt ditt
• Se hvor mye du sparer som medeier i Coop
• Oversikt over alle medlemsfordeler
• Få Medlemskupp, kun for deg som Coop-medlem 

Digitale kvitteringer
• Få digital kvittering fra handleturen rett i appen 

Handleliste
• Digital handleliste i appen
• Del handlelisten med familie og venner
• Legg til varer i handlelisten rett fra kuponger og kundeavis

Vi er alltid interesserte i forslag til forbedringer og nye funksjoner. Gi oss tilbakemelding i appen eller ta kontakt på app@coop.no
Coop – Litt ditt

Velkommen til nye Kitch’n-appen – din digitale kjøkkenassistent!

Vi har bygget appen helt på nytt for å gi deg en enklere, raskere og mer inspirerende opplevelse – uansett om du handler, søker inspirasjon eller holder oversikt over dine fordeler som klubbmedlem.

Dette er nytt:
-	Helt nytt design og navigasjon for bedre oversikt
-	Full kontroll på ditt klubbmedlemskap og fordeler
-	Lag ønskelister, bryllupslister og lagre favorittprodukter
-	Samle og lagre oppskrifter og inspirasjonsartikler
-	Rask innlogging med Face ID
-	Smartere søk blant over 30 000 produkter, oppskrifter og artikler
-	Alle kvitteringer digitalt – lett tilgjengelig når du trenger dem
-	Delta i eksklusive konkurranser 

Og du – aktiver pushvarsler for å få beskjed når vi lanserer nye tilbud, produkter eller inspirasjon.

Har du innspill? Vi vil gjerne høre fra deg: post@kitchn.no

Personvernerklæring: https://www.kitchn.no/kundeservice/personvernerklaering
Ta del av Nelly.com direkt i vår app. Shoppa, inspireras och spara dina favoriter. Enjoy!

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

Med REMA-appen er det enklere å planlegge, handle, velge og spare.

Du får:
• 25% Bonus på åtte utvalgte frukt og grønnsaker hver uke
• Alltid 10% Bonus på alle øvrige fersk frukt og grønnsaker
• Nye Personlige Priskutt tilpasset deg hver uke
• 50% priskutt på alle bleier ved å aktivere kuttet i appen med koden «bleier»
• 50% priskutt på alle bind, tamponger og truseinnlegg ved å aktivere kuttet i appen med koden «bind»
• Delbar handleliste: Søk opp varer, del med venner og familie og rediger i sanntid
• Skann & Betal med mobilen. Er under utrulling, sjekk på rema.no hvilke butikker som har løsningen
• Full oversikt over hva du handler og hvor mye du sparer med REMA-appen

Legg til betalingsmåtene dine i appen for å tjene Bonus, få priskutt og registrere handleturer helt automatisk. Du kan også skanne strekkoden din i kassen før du betaler hvis du betaler med kontanter, klokke eller mobil.

MENY-appen gjør det enklere for deg å planlegge og gjennomføre handelen din hos MENY. Du velger selv om du vil handle i en av våre butikker, bestille og få varene levert på døren eller hente dem på utvalgte MENY-butikker/hentepunkter.
 
Med MENY- appen får du Norges største utvalg av dagligvarer, inspirasjon og gode tilbud rett i lommen.
 
Er du MENY MER-kunde får du tilgang til en rekke smarte verktøy som gjør handleopplevelsen mer effektiv og relevant:

* Kupongtilbud på varer du kjøper ofte
* Aktivering og betaling med Trumf-bonus når du handler hos MENY
* Dine oftest kjøpte varer vises først, så det blir lett å handle dem på nytt
* Tilbudene sorteres etter hva du pleier å handle
* Planlegg handelen med dine egne handlelister
* Automatisk deling av handlevogn med de du deler medlemskap med, eller med andre utenfor medlemskapet.
* Få middagstips med ukemeny
* Lagre alle favorittoppskriftene dine, og legg dem rett i handlevognen
* Få oversikt over alle handlene dine, hvor mye bonus du sparer og se dine kvitteringer.
* Enkel reklamasjon på varer som du ikke var fornøyd med.
* Din personlige innsikt om kosthold og klima, basert på dine kjøp
* Når du er logget inn vil appen også synkroniseres med nettbutikken på MENY.no, slik at du kan starte handelen i appen - og avslutte på web; og motsatt.

Hjemlevering

Vi leverer stort sett i hele landet, i alle typer boliger og etasjer. Du kan sjekke i appen om vi leverer til deg.
 
100% fornøyd - eller pengene tilbake!

Vi garanterer:

* Et stort og spennende utvalg - Hele MENYs utvalg av frukt og grønt, nystekte bakervarer og ferskvarer fra kjøtt- og fiskedisken er tilgjengelig i MENY-appen.
* Den beste kvaliteten - Hvis du mottar en vare med en mangel, får du en ny vare eller pengene tilbake, i form av Trumf-bonus.
* De ferskeste råvarene - Vi er minst like nøye som deg, og plukker de beste og ferskeste råvarene etter strenge kvalitets- og holdbarhetskrav.
* Alltid våre beste priser - Alltid samme tilbud og priser på nett som i butikk. Hver uke har vi hundrevis av gode tilbud, faste knallkjøp og personlige kuponger. Du får Trumf-bonus på alt du kjøper, også på nett, og husk at du også kan betale med Trumf-bonus i MENY-appen.
* Alltid punktlig - Din bestilling er klar til avtalt tid, enten du skal hente varene selv, eller få dem levert hjem, på kontoret eller på hytta.
